SamPy.bolshoi.plotMassRatiosÂ¶

Plots stellar to dark matter halo mass ratios from Bolshoi and compares the results to Peter’s curves.

author:Sami-Matias Niemi

Functions

main(redshifts, path, database, ...) Driver function, call this with a path to the data,
stellarHaloMFRatio(path, database, ...[, ...]) Plots stellar to dark matter halo mass ratios as a function of redshift.
stellarHaloMFRatioMultiPanel(path, database, ...) Plots stellar to dark matter halo mass ratios as a function of redshift.

Classes

MultipleLocator([base]) Set a tick on every integer that is multiple of base in the
NullFormatter Always return the empty string
